input_text:
Job Title: Associate, Production Support

Location: Miami, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position Summary

Responsible for providing support needed for processing/manufacturing activities of HCT/P.

Essential Duties & Responsibilities

Perform routine inventory checks of materials available for production and communicate with supply chain whenever restock is needed.Prepare processing carts with required supplies based on schedule.Clean and package reusable instruments and submit for sterilization.Packing and organizing final product requiring final sterilization and submitting to supply chain for shipping.Transfer and thaw placental tissue for processing.Creating and stamping Batch Production Records.Complete requisitions for quality control samples and submit to the designated lab for bio-burden testing.Create and track work orders.Final product labeling and storage in designated quarantine area.Complete legible documentation (e.g. batch records, cleaning logs, etc.) for review.Document/report equipment and facility problems and any potential deviation.Responsible for performing administrative duties such as but not limited to filing, copying, scanning, and archiving documents as needed.

Position Expertise/Qualifications

College Diploma Related field Preferred

Minimum Years of Experience:

1 year - Inventory control and stocking Required1 year - Administrative support Required1 year - Previous work experience in a GMP environment Preferred

Skills & Abilities

Excellent communication skills; fluent (oral/written) English.Proficient in Microsoft software applications: Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook.

About BioTissue & Our Culture

At BioTissue, we transform the gift of life by sharing miracles. We are a diverse community where talent and teamwork are core to who we are. Here, you are EMPOWERED to do the work you love, be yourself, and make an impact. Resilient and committed to our vision, we embrace challenges, celebrate courage, and take great pride in our work to create life-changing products.

Purpose led us here. Passion and legacy keep us going.

Total Rewards

Health, Dental, Vision Insurance, 401 (k), FMLA, Health Saving Account (HSA), Flexible Spending Account (FSA), Basic Life and AD&D insurance, Voluntary Life and AD&D insurance, Disability, Employee Assistance Program (EAP), LegalShield / IDShield, Pet Insurance, tuition reimbursement, and Birthing & Parental Leave, Paid Holidays, Paid time off, MBO, Stock options.

ADA Statement

Candidates who cannot perform one or more of these requirements due to disability will be eligible for consideration based on whether the candidate can perform the essential functions of the position with a reasonable accommodation.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Associate, Production Support
output_json.summary: Position responsible for providing support for processing/manufacturing activities of HCT/P.

Prepare processing carts with required supplies
Create and stamp Batch Production Records
Complete requisitions for quality control samples
